action.action-desc: Ms. Ross (for herself and Mr. Garcia of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend chapter 4 of title 5, United States Code, relative to the powers of the Department of Justice Inspector General.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Inspector General Access Act of 2025.

section.header: Investigations of Department of Justice personnel
section.text: Section 413 of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking and paragraph (3);
by redesignating paragraphs (4) and (5) as paragraphs (3) and (4), respectively; and
in paragraph (4), as redesignated, by striking paragraph (4) and inserting paragraph (3); and

paragraph.text: in subsection (d), by striking , except with respect to allegations described in subsection (b)(3),.
